name: Frost Survivors: Text Game
storyline:
In Frost Survivors, the world has been devastated by nuclear wars, plunging the Earth into an endless winter. Under a dark sky and relentless snow, humanity clings to survival. You lead a group of survivors, sheltered in an improvised colony, facing extreme cold, mutant creatures, and hordes of zombies.

Each day, your resources dwindle. Hunger, despair, and betrayal lurk around every corner as you explore frozen ruins in search of supplies and ancient technology. Keeping the colony warm is vital—but with every storm, temperatures drop, and the risks grow. Your decisions will shape the future: will you save everyone or make sacrifices to ensure survival?

In this world of ice and death, loyalty is fragile, and every choice could be the difference between life and death. Frost Survivors challenges you to lead, fight, and survive in a brutal, unforgiving environment. Will you outlast the cold?
summary:
Frost Survivors: Rogue-like Text Game in a post-apocalyptic world!
Get ready to face the eternal winter in Frost Survivors, a challenging roguelike text game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
Lead your survivors through strategic decisions in a world ravaged by nuclear war and endless winter, teeming with zombies, mutants, and bandits.
